## ScreenReaderClient.create() method

Connects to a websocket url and returns a corresponding instance of [ScreenReaderClient](./assistive-playwright-client.screenreaderclient.md) as soon as it is connected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static create(url: string): Promise<ScreenReaderClient>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | Websocket URL such as <code>ws://127.0.0.1:7779/screen-reader</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ScreenReaderClient](./assistive-playwright-client.screenreaderclient.md)<!-- -->&gt;
